name: eVerify
tag_list: background-check, criminal-records, database, information, phone-lookup, information-check
overview: eVerify is one of the largest and the most trusted source of U.S. Public Records and Reverse Phone Checks online. With over 1 billion records it’s instant nationwide search system allows for unlimited look ups and and an instant access to data from multiple proprietary databases to compile the most comprehensive reports.
